review: I am still having problems with the amazon fire stick. This is the second one sent to me after the first one didn't work well.I believe it gets too hot, so now I have taken to unplugging it from cord and TV and letting it cool down totally before trying to use it again. Often it pauses and you get that annoying circle thing (loading!).  Can't seem to watch it 2 days in a row without those problems. Glad I paid only $19.99 for it as a promotion instead of $39.99. On the plus side I like the offerings that are free, but I hesitate to purchase a netflix subscription until the stick works 100% of the time.
